long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notify Task extension offers essential tools for managing tasks:

Task Addition: Users can easily add new tasks with just a few clicks.

Task Update: Users can modify task details as their plans or priorities change.

Task Deletion: Completed or unnecessary tasks can be deleted to keep the list organized.

Notification Reminders: The extension sends timely notifications, ensuring users remember to complete tasks on time.

Enhanced Organization: By keeping tasks in one place, users can stay focused and maintain productivity.

Overall, this extension supports effective time management and organization, helping users achieve their goals with fewer distractions.
